projects.title: Real-Time Financial Fraud Detection System
projects.description: Designed and deployed a production-grade fraud detection system processing 500K+ transactions daily using AWS and Databricks. Implemented real-time streaming with Spark Structured Streaming on Databricks, reducing detection latency from 5 minutes to <200ms with 99.5% accuracy. The system uses ML models for anomaly detection and significantly reduced fraud losses.

projects.title: Cloud-Native Music Streaming Analytics Platform
projects.description: Designed and deployed a complete data platform processing 100GB+ of streaming data daily on AWS. Implemented both real-time and batch processing pipelines with automated data quality checks, reducing data issues by 85% and enabling real-time business intelligence for music analytics.

projects.title: AI-Powered Financial Analytics Platform
projects.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive full-stack financial analytics application using Spring Boot and React.js. Integrated OpenAI for intelligent financial insights and natural language reporting, creating an intuitive interface that helps investors make data-driven decisions with AI-assisted analysis

projects.title: Stock Trading Analytics Platform
projects.description: Architected and developed a high-frequency trading engine using Java that processes 500,000+ orders per second with sub-millisecond latency. The system integrates with 15+ global exchanges, implements proprietary trading algorithms, and handles risk management for institutional clients, achieving 99.999% uptime and reducing trade execution time by 90% compared to traditional systems

projects.title: Healthcare Patient Management Platform
projects.description: A HIPAA-compliant healthcare management system using FastAPI and React that serves 100+ medical practitioners and 10,000+ patients. The platform streamlines patient care through electronic health records, appointment scheduling, telemedicine integration, and AI-powered health insights, improving patient outcomes by 35% and reducing administrative workload by 50%

projects.title: Enterprise SEO Intelligence Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive SEO analytics dashboard using React.js and Next.js that processes real-time website performance data. The platform provides AI-powered SEO recommendations, competitor analysis, and automated reporting, helping marketing teams improve search rankings by 65% and organic traffic by 200%.

projects.title: VibeFit: Social Fitness & Wellness Tracker
projects.description: Designed and developed a modern Angular social fitness application that lets users track workouts, share progress, and compete with friends. Integrated with wearable APIs (Google Fit/Apple Health) to import data and used D3.js for beautiful activity charts. Features include a social feed, achievement badges, and personalized workout recommendations, increasing user engagement by 40%.

projects.title: Real-Time Collaborative Code Editor (Like Replit)
projects.description: Built a full-stack application allowing multiple developers to code together in real-time. Implemented operational transforms (OT) for conflict resolution in concurrent editing, ensuring code consistency. Features include live syntax highlighting, language support, video/audio chat via WebRTC, and project execution in isolated Docker containers. Supported 500+ concurrent users with sub-100ms latency
